attributes.action: freeze the parking/traffic fines to the level until decided by an adjudicator on appeal.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if statistically shown that some parking fines are wrongly issued, why should the fines increase act as economic duress to the person such as the driver to pay quickly without any method of reddress which risks the driver to greater penalty in exercising his rights. This whole pay within 14 days is totally disproportional to justice.
